mapper.insert: insert into seats(theater_num, seat_name, userid, cinema_place, time) values (#{theater_num}, #{seat_name}, #{userid}, #{cinema_place}, #{time})
mapper.select: select ticket_idx, userid, movieCd, movie_title, imgpath, cinema_place, theater_num, seat_name, time, price, time_idx from booking where userid = #{userid} order by ticket_idx desc
